name: heart-scale
effect: Trade one to the Move Relearner near the shore in pastoria city or with the Move Deleter in blackthorn city to teach one party Pok√©mon a prior level-up move.
short_effect: No effect. Can be traded for prior Level-up moves.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is extremely rare. It glows faintly in the colors of the rainbow.
